key.name: opacity
key.description: Opacity level of moving windows (in percent). (1 - 100)

key.name: key-move-inc
key.description: Move the window by this amount of pixels for every press on one of the cursor keys. (1 - 250)

key.name: snapoff-semimaximized
key.description: Snapoff and auto-restore semimaximized windows when dragging them.

key.name: snapoff-distance
key.description: Distance of pixels you have to drag a snapped semimaximized window to unsnap it. (0 - 500)

key.name: snapback-semimaximized
key.description: Snapback and re-maximize semimaximized windows when dragging them back.

key.name: snapback-distance
key.description: Number of pixels from top or sides to snap back semimaximized windows. (0 - 250)

key.name: lazy-positioning
key.description: Do not update the server-side position of windows until finished moving.

key.name: mode
key.description: Default mode used for window moving. (0 = Normal, 1 = Outline, 2 = Rectangle)

key.name: increase-border-contrast
key.summary: Use a double-border in 'Rectangle' and 'Outline' modes
key.description: Increase the contrast of the border using a lighter color.

key.name: use-desktop-average-color
key.description: Try to use the desktop average color if defined by your DE (overrides custom colors).

key.name: border-color
key.description: Border color used for outline and rectangle moving modes

key.name: fill-color
key.description: Fill color used for rectangle moving mode
